summary.span: 命名空間包含的類別可用來搭配 Web 伺服器應用程式中的 ASP.NET 使用者設定檔。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to work with ASP.NET user profiles in Web server applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 設定檔用來儲存和擷取資料來源，例如資料庫中的使用者設定。ASP.NET profiles are used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 使用設定檔提供者會管理設定檔資訊和屬性值。Profile information and property values are managed by using a profile provider. 可以使用 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫中儲存設定檔資訊類別，或自訂資料來源所使用的實作抽象類別。Profile information can be stored in a Microsoft SQL Server database by using the class, or in a custom data source by using an implementation of the abstract class. 設定 ASP.NET 設定檔所使用的組態區段。ASP.NET profiles are configured by using the configuration section. 當應用程式啟動時，已啟用的設定檔時，ASP.NET 會建立新的類別類型的`ProfileCommon`，後者繼承自類別。When an application starts that has profiles enabled, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 強型別存取子會加入至`ProfileCommon`定義組態區段中每一個屬性的類別。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property that is defined in the configuration section. 執行個體`ProfileCommon`類別設定的值為屬性的目前物件。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property of the current object. 您可以建立自訂設定檔實作繼承自抽象類別，定義使用者設定檔中的組態項目未指定的屬性。You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and that defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
